Title: Checkmate
Plot: Henry's patience finally wears out and he marries Anne in secret, appoints his Lutheran chaplain Thomas Cranmer the head of the Church of England, and strips Queen Katherine of her title and status; the king and new queen have their first child, and are disappointed that it's a girl...whom they christen Elizabeth.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Anthony Brophy (Ambassador Chapuys), Padraic Delaney (George Boleyn), John Kavanagh (Cardinal Campeggio), David Alpay (Mark Smeaton), Bosco Hogan (Bishop Fisher), Sarah Bolger (Princess Mary Tudor), James
